name: Slime Sprint
description:
SPRINT TO THE FINISH
Sprint through lava ridden dungeons and attempt to achieve the best time possible in this arcade style 2D platformer. With 30 levels and 120 medals to achieve, becoming the best will be no easy task.



UNLOCK MEDALS TO PROVE YOUR SKILL
Each level has 4 medals: bronze, silver, gold and diamond, but only the truly worthy can beat the developers time and achieve the diamond medals. Earning medals will reward the player with gold to buy new skins and trails, although this will not make the levels any easier, at least you can attempt to achieve greatness in style.



CUSTOMISE YOUR CHARACTER
With 10 skins to earn, there is a skin for everyone. From fun animal skins to aliens, earn a skin to fit you. Spend gold to unlock trails to match your chosen skin and attempt to achieve all 30 diamond medals and unlock the god slime skin.
